hero.title: Your AI Transformation Partner.
hero.subtitle: Fast-Track with AI
hero.description: Start with an AI Fast-Track Session to uncover opportunities and design your first quick win. Then scale into full transformation with strategy, automation, and measurable outcomes.

services.title: The Problem Today
services.description: AI tools are everywhere — but without strategy, businesses still struggle. Here's where AI makes the real difference.
services.ctaText: The challenge isn't AI tools. It's knowing where they bring ROI.

chaos.title: Operational Chaos
chaos.description: Your operations feel like chaos — manual steps, scattered systems, no clarity.
chaos.solution: How AI helps: A clear AI roadmap aligns technology with your business goals and removes inefficiencies.

funnel.title: Leaky Sales Funnels
funnel.description: Leads slip away, follow-ups are missed, conversion rates stay low.
funnel.solution: How AI helps: Custom AI agents qualify leads, automate outreach, and keep prospects engaged.

time.title: Wasted Time
time.description: Teams spend hours on repetitive tasks and gut-feel decisions.
time.solution: How AI helps: Data analytics turn raw data into insights, saving time and guiding smarter choices.

competitors.title: Falling Behind Competitors
competitors.description: Competitors adopt faster, cut costs, and deliver better service while you lag.
competitors.solution: How AI helps: Process automation eliminates bottlenecks, reduces errors, and keeps you ahead.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: We don't start with tools. We start with your business — then apply AI where it delivers ROI.
approach.ctaText: Want to see how this works for your business?

discovery.title: Discover Bottlenecks
discovery.description: We uncover hidden blockers in your sales, operations, and finance that waste time and money.

strategy.title: Redesign Processes
strategy.description: We rebuild your workflows for efficiency and clarity — making them scale-ready.

development.title: Reinforce with AI
development.description: We apply AI only where it creates ROI — custom agents, automations, or analytics that matter.

integration.title: Measure ROI
integration.description: We track results with clear KPIs — so every improvement proves its business value.

difference.title: The NordAI Difference
difference.description: Why leading businesses choose NordAI to accelerate their digital transformation.

speed.title: Speed to Market
speed.description: Our streamlined process gets you from concept to deployment 60% faster.

custom.title: Custom Solutions
custom.description: No cookie-cutter approaches. Every solution is tailored to your unique needs.

support.title: Ongoing Support
support.description: 24/7 monitoring and continuous optimization to ensure peak performance.

caseStudies.title: Proven Outcomes
caseStudies.subtitle: From lead generation to sales dashboards — here's what AI has delivered for real businesses.
caseStudies.ctaText: Want to explore what AI could do for your business?

cases.title: Lead Generation
cases.work: LinkedIn scraper = 10,000 leads in one click.
cases.outcome: No more purchased lists, fresh leads each month.

cases.title: Smart Outreach Automation
cases.work: AI email automation with personalized templates.
cases.roiBreakdown: From 500 replies/year to ~2,000; avg deal $1,000 = +$20k revenue; system ~$3k → ROI ≈ 6–7×.

cases.title: AI Voice Agent
cases.problem: Sales staff wasted ~40 hrs/month cold calling.
cases.outcome: Sales only focus on hot prospects.
cases.roiBreakdown: Saved ~480 hrs/year ≈ $3,000 labor cost; setup ~$500 → ROI ≈ 6×.

cases.title: AI Sales Dashboard
cases.problem: No live tracking of sales KPIs.
cases.work: Dashboard with real-time performance metrics + AI suggestions.

cases.title: Content Engines
cases.work: AI generates visuals, texts, auto-updates Shopify.

cases.title: Google Maps Scraper
cases.problem: Sales agents spent ~40 hrs/month on manual search.
cases.roiBreakdown: Saved ~480 hrs/year ≈ $3,000 labor cost; cost ~$500 → ROI ≈ 6×.

pricing.title: Subscription Partnerships
pricing.intro: With NordAI, you don't just buy a one-off project — you get a partnership subscription. Each month we dedicate time to diagnosing your business, redesigning processes, and implementing AI solutions that bring measurable ROI. You don't pay for hours worked — you pay for continuous improvements and results.
pricing.scarcity: Spots are limited. Long-term plans guarantee your place and discounted pricing.

startSmall.name: Start Small
features: AI diagnostic report with ROI opportunities
advantages: Perfect for testing AI in your business safely

goBig.name: Go Big
advantages: Stronger ROI focus — not just small fixes, but structural changes
Hands-on automation that saves costs every month
Ideal for SMBs ready to scale with AI

fullInvolvement.name: Full Involvement
advantages: Personal guidance from Ivan (not just consultants)
Tailored AI agents that give you competitive edge
Functions like having your own AI transformation partner inside your company

longTerm.title: 6–12 Months
benefits: Priority access to new tools & community

monthly.title: Month-to-Month
risks: Limited availability (may lose your spot if all slots are full)
Harder to build long-term systems (difficult to strategize)
Progress may stall if you stop and return later

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple flow: start small with a Fast-Track Session, then continue with a subscription partnership if it makes sense.

step1.title: Fast-Track Session
step1.description: Book a ☕ Fast-Track Session. In 60 minutes, we identify ROI opportunities for your business.

step2.title: ROI Roadmap
step2.description: You receive a clear roadmap: what can be improved, automated, or redesigned with AI to bring value.

step3.title: Choose a Subscription
step3.description: If you see the value, continue with one of our subscription partnerships (Start Small, Go Big, or Full Involvement).

step4.title: Monthly Partnership
step4.description: We work together every month — diagnosing, implementing AI, and tracking ROI improvements.

q1.question: Do I have to subscribe after Fast-Track?
q1.answer: No. Fast-Track is standalone. If you don't see value, you don't continue.

q2.question: What if no ROI opportunities are found?
q2.answer: We refund the session. Your risk is zero.

q3.question: How long does it take to start seeing results?
q3.answer: Most clients see quick wins in the first 30–60 days of subscription.

q4.question: Why not skip straight to subscription?
q4.answer: The Fast-Track ensures we only build what drives ROI. No wasted money, no wrong projects.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Got questions? Here are the most common ones from SMB owners.

questions.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
questions.answer: No. We focus on business processes and ROI. The technical part is handled by us and AI tools.

questions.question: What if it doesn't work for my business?
questions.answer: We always start with a Fast-Track Session. If we don't find ROI, you don't continue. Plus: 100% money-back guarantee on the first session.

questions.question: How much time will it take from me?
questions.answer: 3–4 hours per month for meetings. Everything else (analysis, prep, automation) is done by us and AI.

questions.question: Is my data safe?
questions.answer: Yes. We only work with secure tools and always respect confidentiality.

questions.question: How quickly will I see results?
questions.answer: Most clients see measurable results in the first 30–60 days.

questions.question: Can I cancel anytime?
questions.answer: Yes. Subscriptions are month-to-month, unless you lock in 6–12 months for discounts.

questions.question: Do you only work with certain industries?
questions.answer: We specialize in SMBs (manufacturing, services, retail) but adapt AI to any industry.

questions.question: Do you build custom AI agents/software?
questions.answer: Yes, but only when it makes ROI sense. We focus on business value, not automation for its own sake.

dataTypes.useCase: Turn your document chaos into organized, searchable intelligence
dataTypes.accuracy: AI understands context, not just text

dataTypes.useCase: Transform your Google Drive mess into structured business intelligence

dataTypes.name: Your Email Mountains
dataTypes.description: Years of emails with attachments, contracts, and conversations? AI extracts every important detail.
dataTypes.useCase: Turn email chaos into relationship and contract intelligence

dataTypes.name: Your Old System Exports
dataTypes.description: That ancient CRM export, old accounting software data, or CSV files from 2015? AI makes sense of it all.
dataTypes.useCase: Rescue valuable insights from old systems without expensive migrations

dataTypes.name: Your Real-World Mix

dataTypes.useCase: Digitize and organize everything from the physical world
